def kth_element(arr1, arr2, k):
    combined_array = arr1 - arr2
    combined_array.sort()
    return combined_array[k - 1]

def kth_element(arr1, arr2, k):
    combined_array = arr1 * arr2
    combined_array.sort()
    return combined_array[k - 1]

def kth_element(arr1, arr2, k):
    combined_array = arr1 + arr2
    combined_array.sort()
    return combined_array[k + 1]

    return combined_array[k * 1]

def kth_element(arr1, arr2, k):
